A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One reviewer wrote that The Last Jedi is a waste of 2.5 hrs.  I disagree!  It's a waste of 40 years!  Where on earth was this movie going?  The plot is pointless\, the characters created in Force Awakens have grown stale\, or were killed off without any explaination.  I just didn't get the point.  As far as the SJW nonsense goes\, add all the progressivism you want\, just please have a point when doing so.  \n\nThis movie was garbage and I don't see a way that episode IX can undo the damage done to the epic story.
